R

randomi - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Specification
The common random object shared by the entire dungeon.
RARE - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Specification
 
removeAllPivots() - Method in class dungeonette.domain.Room
removes all pivots
removeSalts() - Method in class dungeonette.domain.Floor
Removes all salts from the floor.
removeThinPassageWalls(Floor, Specification) - Static method in class dungeonette.generator.PassageCarver
If two passageways are running parrallel next to each other, then the wall between them will be removed, creating a wider room-like space.
resetArea() - Method in class dungeonette.domain.Room
Resets the counter for floor tiles of the room
reshape(Room) - Static method in class dungeonette.generator.RoomStrangifier
Reshapes a room.
Room - Class in dungeonette.domain
Object class for the rooms placed into the dungeon.
Room(Point, Dimension, int, char, Random) - Constructor for class dungeonette.domain.Room
Constructor for a room in a dungeon floor.
roomCenter - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Room
 
roomConnectivity - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Specification
Number of bonus connecting passageways are generated per floor.
RoomDecorator - Class in dungeonette.generator
Class used to decorate newly constructed rooms with random items, furniture and such.
RoomDecorator() - Constructor for class dungeonette.generator.RoomDecorator
 
roomDensity - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Specification
Density of room placement.
RoomInserter - Class in dungeonette.generator
Class used to examine wether a room of specific size can be placed on a specific location of a floor
RoomInserter() - Constructor for class dungeonette.generator.RoomInserter
 
roomLayout - Variable in class dungeonette.domain.Floor
 
RoomNode - Class in dungeonette.data
RoomNode is an RoomQueue'able container holding a single room object.
RoomNode(Room, RoomNode) - Constructor for class dungeonette.data.RoomNode
Creates new room node
RoomQueue - Class in dungeonette.data
Queue for RoomNodes, with each RoomNode containg a room.
RoomQueue() - Constructor for class dungeonette.data.RoomQueue
 
RoomShaper - Class in dungeonette.generator
This class gives the basic rectangular shape to a room.
RoomShaper() - Constructor for class dungeonette.generator.RoomShaper
 
RoomStrangifier - Class in dungeonette.generator
This class gives an alternative shape for a room.
RoomStrangifier() - Constructor for class dungeonette.generator.RoomStrangifier
